introduction: 此作品呈现了作者将“我”作为研究样本，将自我以及自我概念互为镜子，循着无象无形的轨迹踏入更深的深渊继续寻觅的过程。它是作者创建自我进程中的一部分，也是四屏录像电影长片《我之为我—深度表演练习》中的第四章节。the works presents my research as self becoming the object, taking the “self” and the concept of “self” as a mirror reflecting each other, leading to a formless trace to the abyss on a deeper level. it is a part of the process of self-construction, as well as the forth chapter of my video film with four screens named “let it be and be it yourself”.
